1.title: The Bad Case of the Weasels
1.plot: The Ross kids trade their penthouse for Camp Kikiwaka for the summer only to to find a new counselor in the Woodchuck cabin.

2.title: Dance in My Pants
2.plot: Tiffany and Zuri are hoping they'll dance with a cute boy at the annual dance; Emma finds out that Lou and Xander have a history.

3.title: Zuri Has a Little Lamb
3.plot: The boys find that Gladys has been hiding a secret in the woods; Lou assigns Emma and Zuri to barn duty.

4.title: Zuri Weasels Out
4.plot: Hazel makes Zuri a counselor in training in the weasel cabin, much to Hazel's dismay; Jorge and Griff tell Ravi that the camp's horse has a secret talent.

5.title: Queen of Screams
5.plot: Jorge wins a dinner with his favorite horror writer, Stephanie Queen, and brings some of his fellow campers along; Xander acts as referee between Emma and Ravi.

6.title: Luke Out Below
6.plot: Luke comes back to camp and takes Griff and Zuri on an adventure to prove that he's just as responsible as the other CITs.

7.title: Camp Kiki-slasher
7.plot: Campers mysteriously are disappearing and strange things are happening they campers must find out before it's too late.

8.title: Treehouse of Terror
8.plot: Zuri, Jorge and Tiffany enlist the support of an unexpected camper to help restore an abandoned tree house they found as their new hangout. Meanwhile, Emma and Lou, Ravi and Xander get competitive during a friendly game of billiards.

9.title: Tidal Wave
9.plot: Zuri helps Xander make a music video in the hopes of turning him into a social media star. Ravi and Lou try to do something nice for Griff.

10.title: Fog'd In
10.plot: A strange, toxic fog overtakes Camp Kikiwaka causing the campers to develop bizarrely altered personalities and it's up to the camp counselors to save the day.

11.title: How the Griff Stole Christmas
11.plot: It's holiday time at Camp Kikiwaka and everyone is in good spirits except for Griff.

12.title: Food Fight
12.plot: After Murphy challenges the kids to cook the camp dinner, the CITs and the counselors compete against one another.

13.title: Mother May I?
13.plot: Lou is in awe when her hero, the legendary Christina Ross, pays a visit to Camp Kikiwaka; the boys from Grizzly Cabin head out for an overnight camping trip.

14.title: Mud Fight
14.plot: After disobeying Ravi's wishes when on a hike, Zuri, Tiffany and Jorge get into a muddy situation; Lou imagines what her life would be like in 1916 with her crush.

15.title: Dog Days of Summer
15.plot: When Lou decides to leave Camp Kikiwaka after she learns about the passing of her dog, the campers get together to help her realize how much she means to them.

16.title: Bad Dog!
16.plot: Emma, Tiffany and Zuri are not happy when Lou's new puppy, Chuck, wreaks havoc on the Woodchuck cabin; Ravi encourages Jorge to do his best to set a camp record in order receive a plaque.

17.title: Camp Stinky Waka
17.plot: When Tiffany's mother comes to visit, the Woodchucks try to help Tiffany pretend that Camp Kikiwaka is a camp for geniuses.

18.title: Cabin vs. Cabin
18.plot: The Woodchuck, Grizzly, and Weasel cabins compete in Camp Kikiwaka's annual 'Cabin of the Year' competition.

19.title: Dreams Come True
19.plot: As the end of camp nears, Griff gets some unexpected news about his parole term.

20.title: We Didn't Start the Fire
20.plot: To celebrate their last night at camp, the kids go on an overnight camping trip. Ravi and Emma take their final tests to become counselors.

21.title: The Great Escape
21.plot: Zuri and Griff have a crush on each other, but Emma and Xander think they are up to something that could get them in trouble.

36.title: Last day of camp
36.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

67.title: Luke comes back
67.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Welcome to Camp Kikiwaka
1.plot: Emma, Zuri, and Ravi leave the New York penthouse and they ended up in Camp Kikiwaka; They are not handling the place very well.

2.title: Gone Girl
2.plot: Ravi becomes suspicious when he overhears Xander's plans for his first date with Emma. Meanwhile, Zuri and Jorge set up a secret business selling candy and video games to the campers.

3.title: Camp Rules
3.plot: Emma and Zuri won't stop fighting, so Lou sends them out in a canoe in the middle of the lake to work out their differences.

4.title: Smells Like Camp Spirit
4.plot: Emma and Xander lose the camp spirit stick, which curses the campers with bad luck. Meanwhile, Jorge and Tiffany try to teach Ravi how to swim.

5.title: The Ones That Got Away
5.plot: When Emma and Xander team up for the fishing competition, they soon realize they don't have much in common. Meanwhile, Zuri and Tiffany devise a plan to steal fish from the mess hall to submit in the competition.

6.title: Can You Hear Me Now?
6.plot: When Zuri secretly keeps her cell phone beyond the allotted amount of time, it prompts Hazel and Lou to conduct a camp-wide search. Meanwhile, Ravi and Tiffany are duped into making a cell phone tower hidden in the new camp totem pole.

7.title: Friending with the Enemy
7.plot: Emma convinces Lou that they should make an effort to become friends with Hazel. Meanwhile, a TV producer gets Ravi, Zuri and Tiffany to help him hunt the legendary Kikiwaka monster.

8.title: Waka, Waka, Waka!
8.plot: Ravi and Tiffany get video PROOF that the Kikiwaka exists. Meanwhile, Emma and Lou try to outsell Hazel at the Kikiwaka Day Festival.

9.title: Secret Santa
9.plot: Ravi's advice to Emma and Lou on their CIT gift exchange doesn't go as imagined. Meanwhile, Zuri, Xander, Jorge and Tiffany run into a disgruntled man they are convinced is Santa and must work together to save Christmas.

10.title: Counselors' Night Off
10.plot: Emma sneaks out to the "Counselors' Night Out" party to eavesdrop on Xander, leaving Ravi in charge back at camp.

11.title: There's No Place Like Camp
11.plot: When Xander and Ravi realize that Jorge is homesick, they enlist the help of Emma, Zuri and Tiffany to cheer him up.

12.title: Luke's Back
12.plot: Luke gets some summer school help from Ravi and reunites with his siblings; Camp Kikiwaka and its rival engage in a turf war.

13.title: No Escape
13.plot: Zuri and Jorge sneak out to buy something from the town store; Xander and Emma have to find them before Gladys notices that they're all missing.

14.title: Close Encounters of the Camp Kind
14.plot: After the campers think they see a UFO land in Lake Kikiwaka, a new boy shows up and Jorge and Tiffany think he's an alien. Meanwhile, Emma and Ravi get evaluated by the camp counselors.

15.title: Crafted and Shafted
15.plot: During an overnight camping trip, the kids must use their survival skills after Emma and Xander get lost in a cave.

16.title: Boo Boos and Birthdays
16.plot: Emma and Zuri butt heads when trying to plan a surprise birthday party for Tiffany. Meanwhile, in order to get out of a volleyball tournament, Ravi and Jorge fake injuries.

17.title: For Love and Money
17.plot: Lou falls for a handsome young lumberjack but Emma and Zuri are suspicious of him. Ravi and Jorge go on a treasure hunt.

18.title: Love Is for the Birds
18.plot: Zuri and Tiffany find an eagle egg. They try to return it to the nest but get stuck in the tree.

19.title: Bride and Doom
19.plot: The campers learn about Olga, the daughter of the camp founder whose ghost supposedly haunts Kikiwaka. A camp wedding may be the only way to rid the camp of the ghost.

20.title: Live from Camp Kikiwaka
20.plot: Gladys announces that the camp might close; Emma, Xander and Lou host a live stream to try and save the camp.

21.title: Xander Says Goodbye
21.plot: Xander's dad wants him to leave camp and start football training; Emma, Ravi and Lou put him through his paces.

1.title: We Can't Bear It!
1.plot: The Ross kids return to Camp Kikiwaka only to discover the cabins were never rebuilt and Gladys has disappeared. Now they must figure out how to keep the kids happy, including new campers Matteo, Destiny and Finn.

2.title: Let's Bounce!
2.plot: After learning they are officially the new owners of Camp Kikiwaka, the Ross siblings have to decide which one of them will actually be in charge of the camp.

3.title: Take the Cake
3.plot: When Lou decides that the campers should practice public speaking, Matteo and Destiny help Finn overcome his fear.

4.title: O Sister, Where Art Thou?
4.plot: Ravi helps Matteo overcome his fears using hypnosis, but Matteo's newfound confidence could get him into trouble.

5.title: Cav'd In
5.plot: After Matteo and Finn express their frustration with Ravi's spying, Ravi decides to use a drone to spy on them instead.

6.title: By All Memes
6.plot: Emma decides to give everyone back their cell phones to foster camp unity and bring everyone closer together on her new Campstagram app.

7.title: A Whole Lotta Lobsta
7.plot: Destiny and Matteo try to save the lobsters that Ravi's cooking for the Lobster fest. Meanwhile, Zuri's looking after Finn, and Lou and Emma are having trouble setting the whole thing up.

8.title: No Bones About It
8.plot: Matteo and Finn come across a strange collection of bones and suspect they are from a new species; they set a trap for the creature and want credit for their new discovery.

9.title: Finder's Keepers, Lou's a Weeper
9.plot: Finn, Matteo and Destiny fix up an old car as a present for Lou's 10-year anniversary at Camp Kikiwaka; Emma, Ravi and Zuri decide to throw Lou a surprise party.

10.title: Reversal of Fortune
10.plot: The counselors clean out the storage room and find a fortuneteller machine that reveals something important will go missing and a sister will betray another sister.

11.title: Game of Totems
11.plot: Everyone prepares for the upcoming camp tournament, the Kikiwaka Cup; Zuri, captain of the campers team, is confident that her group will finally beat the counselors.

12.title: Toilets and Tiaras
12.plot: When Zuri decides to host a beauty pageant at Camp Kikiwaka, Destiny is very excited but Lou wants nothing to do with it.

13.title: Bungle in the Jungle
13.plot: Lou decides to go to college the following year, but her mother wants her to take over the family farm.

14.title: Gruel and Unusual Punishment
14.plot: The children explore the booths at Camp Kikiwaka's Olde Moose Rump Days; after finding an old wooden box from Zuri's booth, the kids suddenly find themselves in the 1600s wearing Colonial garb.

15.title: It's a Blast!
15.plot: The campers prepare to participate in a model rocket competition where they will face three rounds, including altitude, speed, and safety.

16.title: Up, Up and Away
16.plot: Because Emma, Zuri and Ravi have new jobs, their mother wants to sell the camp. Worried that Lou will be devastated when she finds out, the three tell it her on a balloon ride.

locations: Hollywood Center Studios - 1040 N. Las Palmas Avenue, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, USA::(studio)
imdb.title: Bunk'd
plot: Emma, Ravi, and Zuri Ross head off to a rustic summer camp in Maine, where their parents met as teens. Along with their new friends, love triangle, and the fears of the camp, the trio tries their best to settle into their exciting and challenging new lives at Camp Kikiwaka.::kokolala
